numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that families with higher income tend to have a higher chance of acceptance into elite colleges than families with lower income.
2. Having a legacy in a family seems to be an advantage for admission to an elite college.
3. I wonder whether the results would be different if applicants do not have a family legacy.
4. I wonder whether applicants with higher income would still be admitted if they do not have a family legacy.
5. My community is a lower-income community.
6. The lower income of my community can affect acceptance into some colleges.
7. For people from my community, applying to elite colleges may be harder.
8. People from my community may not have the same resources as people with higher income.
9. Money may be the answer to getting into elite colleges.
